summary: Interviews with Beach Boy Brian Wilson and his contemporaries outline the history of Wilson's album "Smile," a project some 37 years in the making.
cast: David Anderle|Hal Blaine|Jeff Bridges|Elvis Costello|Roger Daltrey|Natalie Imbruglia|Carol Kaye|George Martin|Paul McCartney|Van Dyke Parks|Sylvie Simmons|Michael Vosse|Brian Wilson
keywords: pop music|reference to the beach boys|songwriter|making of album
title: Beautiful Dreamer: Brian Wilson and the Story of 'Smile'
